snippet.title: Tin Hearts | Rift
snippet.description:
Enter a World of Magic and Beauty...

In the world of Tin Hearts you will feel like a child in a toy store. Immerse yourself if the warm, peaceful environments and take your time working through the puzzles whilst enjoying the game's beautiful soundtrack. We've tried our hardest to build a world that you'll want to spend time in even when not focusing on the gameplay itself.

Use your Ingenuity...

Unlock powers to control objects in the world, from wooden blocks to drums to toy trains. From humble beginnings you'll soon become a master of this mysterious world. Link objects in interesting ways as you build paths to the exit for your fearless tin soldiers to follow!

Unravel the Story...

What is this place and who are the mysterious people in it? Embark on an adventure masterfully woven into the fabric of this puzzle game world. Clues are everywhere and if you seek them out you will be rewarded with an emotional, human tale that aims to resonate beyond the world of the game itself!
